content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper plate mine at position(-46.5, 70.5)
Consists of electric mining drill at position(-46.5, 70.5)

### Military science pack production at position(15.5, 0.5)
Consists of assembling machine 2 at position(15.5, 0.5), input inserter at position(17.5, 0.5), output inserter at position(13.5, 0.5), and output chest at position(12.5, 0.5)

### Piercing rounds magazine production at position(-42.5, 2.5)
Consists of assembling machine 2 at position(-42.5, 2.5), input inserter at position(-40.5, 2.5), output inserter at position(-44.5, 2.5), and output chest at position(-45.5, 2.5)

### Firearm magazine production at position(-38.5, 6.5)
Consists of assembling machine 2 at position(-38.5, 6.5), input inserter at position(-36.5, 6.5), output inserter at position(-40.5, 6.5), and output chest at position(-41.5, 6.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when researching a technology that is already researched
- Ensure the technology is not already researched before attempting to research it.

### Errors when crafting an item with missing sub-ingredients
- Ensure all required sub-ingredients are available and can be crafted before attempting to craft an item.

### Errors when placing an entity at a position occupied by another entity
- Ensure the target position is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place a new entity. Consider increasing the spacing or changing the direction.

### Errors when getting a non-existent entity at a specific position
- Verify the existence of an entity at the specified position before attempting to access or manipulate it.

### Errors due to undefined variables
- Ensure all variables are defined before using them in the code.

### Errors when powering an electric entity without a power source
- Ensure a valid power source is available and connected to the electric entity.

### Errors when creating a production line
- Ensure that the production line is properly configured and that all required entities are placed correctly.

### Errors due to list index out of range
- Ensure that the list indices used in the code are within the valid range.

### Errors due to undefined names
- Ensure that all names used in the code are defined before using them.

### Errors when providing ingredients for production
- Ensure that the required ingredients are available in the inventory before attempting to provide them.

## NAMESPACE

### Function signatures and descriptions

No utility functions have been defined by the agent.

### Important variables

- `wooden-chest`: int (count: 7)
- `storage-tank`: int (count: 10)
- `transport-belt`: int (count: 500)
